entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
